name: Extra Loud Volume Booster
description:
🔊 Welcome to the best Extra Loud Volume Booster for Android 🔊
Extra Loud Volume Booster can boost volume on phone with only one tap without distorting the sound. You can create great sound booster, speaker booster when listening to music, music player, watching movies with this app.

Main Features of Extra Loud Volume Booster
🎧 Boost volume up to 100%
🎧 Just one-tap to boost volume on phone
🎧 Increase volume for media , notificationm, and alarm volume
🎧 Boost all your system sounds
🎧 Volume booster doesn't need ROOT required
🎧 Both sound volume booster for headphones and speaker
🎧 Boost the bass also
🎧 Not all devices support this volume booster
🎧 Easy-to-use volume booster
🎧 Extra Loud Volume Booster is FREE 100%

Download Extra Loud Volume Booster app and enjoy boosting your mobile phone or tablet volume easy & fast.

Extra Loud Volume Booster is still in the development stage, we always listen to feedback from you, we hope you will appreciate and comment, we will definitely upgrade and develop more features as beloved. Sincerely Thank!
